## Main topics {.unnumbered .smaller}

::: {.incremental}
1. Introduction to Forecasting
2. Time series graphics
3. Time series decomposition
4. Forecasting workflow
5. Exponential smoothing
6. Mid-term Quiz
7. ARIMA models
8. Advanced forecasting methods
9. Neural networks forecasting
10. Final Project
:::
